content: venusray s demi bag materials cotton yarn i used lily sugar n cream yarn color sonoma print 2 balls size h crochet hook abbreviations chain chain sl slip single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet esc extended single_crochet st/sts stitch/stitches * - repeat the instructions pattern base ch30 round 1 2dc in 4th st 1dc in the next 25 sts 6 double_crochet into last st this completes one side of the base 1dc in next 25 sts this is the other side of the base 3dc into last st join with a slip_stitch into 3rd chain of beginning ch3 62 double_crochet sts including ch3 at the beginning of the round round 2 ch3 counts at 1dc 1dc into same st 2dc into next 2 sts 1 double_crochet into next 25 sts 2dc into next 6 sts 1 double_crochet into next 25 sts 2 double_crochet into remaining 3 sts join with a slip_stitch into 3rd chain of beginning of ch3 74 double_crochet sts rnd3 ch3 counts at 1dc 1dc into same st 2dc into next 3 sts 1 double_crochet into next 29 sts 2dc into next 8 sts 1 double_crochet into next 29 sts 2 double_crochet into remaining 4 sts join with a slip_stitch into 3rd chain of beginning of ch3 90 double_crochet sts body round 4 ch3 counts at 1dc 2dc into same st skip next 2 sts 3dc into next st * repeat from * around join with a slip_stitch into 3rd chain of beginning of ch3 90 double_crochet sts round 5 slip_stitch into next st ch3 counts at 1dc 2dc into same st skip next 2 sts 3dc into next st * repeat from * around join with a slip_stitch into 3rd chain of beginning of ch3 90 double_crochet sts round 6-19 repeat rnd5 you ll have about 8 inches of the bag s body if you want a longer/shorter bag adjust accordingly round 20 ch1 does not count as a st 1 single_crochet into same st 1sc around join with a slip_stitch into 1st single_crochet 90 single_crochet sts round 21-25 repeat rnd20 this is the edge of the bag this is about 1 25 long strap pattern may be hard to understand a youtube video may help i recommend crochet cord by @crochetbyjen4410 round 1 ch2 single_crochet into 1st st turn the work inward and esc into the side st round 2 turn work inward insert the hook into the 2 sts on the side facing you and do an esc repeat rnd2 until you reach the length 72 inches on the front of the bag insert the stap in between 3rd and 4th shell a shell is a group of 3 double_crochet in the same stitch skip 2 shells and pull it out skip 8 shells and insert the strap in skip 2 shells and pull the strap out skip 3 shells and insert the strap in skip 2 shells and pull the strap out skip 8 shells and pull the strap in skip 2 shells and pull it
